titleStmt.title: The lavviers logike exemplifying the præcepts of logike by the practise of the common lawe, by Abraham Fraunce.
titleStmt.author: Fraunce, Abraham, fl. 1587-1633.
Ramus, Petrus, 1515-1572. Dialecticae libri duo.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by William How, for Thomas Gubbin, and T. Newman,

notesStmt.note: In part derived from: Ramus, Petrus. Dialecticae libri duo.
A variant of the edition with How's name alone in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Chicago. Library.
